channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Defense of Strip Malls
item.description: If these commercial establishments offend your taste, don’t shop in them.

item.title: Navies Go to War with the Fleets They Possess
item.description: Congress must focus on shoring up the Navy’s operational strategy and its industrial base in the next U.S. defense budget.

item.title: Here’s A List Of Unique, Made-In-America Gifts From Each State
item.description: The American Dream – that if you work hard, anyone can get ahead— is fulfilled by the risk takers who start businesses.

item.title: Wisconsin’s Lib-Led Supreme Court Stacks The Congressional Map Deck
item.description: The latest leftist gerrymander stunt should serve as a reminder to Republicans that failure to rewrite representation lines is not an option.

item.title: Trump defends Hegseth over reports of a second strike on alleged drug boat
item.description: President Trump on Sunday downplayed reports that his defense secretary ordered military members to strike a suspected drug boat a second time after a...

item.title: Roman Hierarchy Should Discipline NYC Church For Confirming Unrepentant Gay TV Anchor
item.description: Nothing less than a clear and firm correction of the priests who conspired to abuse the sacraments and confuse the Catholic Church’s unambiguous teach...

item.title: New Docs Reveal Jack Smith Intentionally Violated Congressional Republicans’ Constitutional Rights
item.description: Smith never should have approved the subpoenas since they violated the congressional Republicans’ clearly established rights.

item.title: The Middle Class Can’t Keep Up With Persistent Inflation Forever
item.description: Conservatives should focus like a laser beam on making life better for the middle class.

item.title: Washington Gave Bigotry No Sanction. We Should Do the Same
item.description: The measure of American pluralism has never been how well we tolerate those who already think like us.

item.title: Trump commutes prison sentence for former private equity executive convicted of defrauding investors
item.description: President Donald Trump has commuted the prison sentence of former investment manager David Gentile, who was convicted of defrauding investors - the la...

item.title: Lawmakers voice support for congressional reviews of Trump's military strikes on boats
item.description: Lawmakers from both parties said Sunday they support congressional reviews of U.S. military strikes against vessels suspected of smuggling drugs in th...

item.title: What Brought the Trump Administration to the Brink with the Venezuelan Regime
item.description: Venezuela’s regime is the archetype of a cartel-state synthesis.

item.title: Remembering John Simon
item.description: NR’s longtime film critic belonged to a more cultivated, discerning age.

item.title: Trump does not plan to send troops into Venezuela, Sen. Markwayne Mullin says
item.description: Sen. Markwayne Mullin said Sunday that President Trump does not plan to attack Venezuela.

item.title: Feds clam up a year after New Jersey drone sightings
item.description: Look, up in the sky! It's a bird. It's a plane. It's -- well, it's been a year since the drone sightings over New Jersey and we still don't quite know...
